meta.title: Arclet Copier - Quick URL Copy Chrome Extension
meta.description: A powerful Chrome extension for quick URL copying with smart parameter filtering, custom template system, batch copying, short URL generation, and QR code generation.

hero.title: Quick URL Copy
hero.subtitle: Powerful Chrome Extension
hero.description: Copy current page URL with one click. Supports smart parameter filtering, custom templates, batch copying, short URL generation, and QR code generation. Boost your productivity.

items.title: One-Click URL Copy
items.description: Support popup click, hotkey silent copy, and right-click menu access

items.title: Smart Parameter Cleaning
items.description: Three-level modes: Off, Smart, Aggressive. Precisely remove UTM tracking parameters

items.title: Custom Template System
items.description: Powerful template engine with variable substitution and custom formats, real-time preview

items.title: Batch Copy Feature
items.description: Multi-window tab batch copying with filters, deduplication, and multiple export formats

items.title: Short URL Generation
items.description: Support is.gd and TinyURL services with caching mechanism and concurrent limits

items.title: QR Code Generation
items.description: Generate QR codes for current page URLs, support copying QR code images to clipboard

items.title: Modern Theme
items.description: Arc-style design with Auto/Light/Dark modes and multiple theme colors

items.title: Hotkey Support
items.description: Ctrl+Shift+C silent copy, right-click menu, popup Ctrl+C quick operation

items.title: Multi-Language Support
items.description: Support 9 languages: Chinese, English, Japanese, German, French, Spanish, etc.

screenshots.title: Interface Preview
screenshots.home1_desc: Clean and intuitive extension popup with clear functional layout
screenshots.home2_desc: Support batch operations on multiple URLs to improve work efficiency
screenshots.home3_desc: Customize short link services, notifications, interface language, themes and various configurations
screenshots.home4_desc: Create and edit personalized copy format templates for various use cases

download.title: Download Now
download.subtitle: Free to use, open source and trustworthy
download.chrome_store_desc: Install from official store, safe and reliable
download.github_release_desc: Download source package, manually install latest version
install_steps: Install from store: Chrome Web Store or Edge Add-ons Store
Or download source package for manual installation
Open browser extension management page (Chrome: chrome://extensions/ or Edge: edge://extensions/)
If using source package, enable developer mode and load unpacked extension

footer.description: Arclet Copier is an open source Chrome extension
